name: Lunar Lander (itch) (P1ayer0ne)
description:
This ascii homage to the classic retro arcade game lunar lander was made as an assignment for my university course. It was my first time coding in c++ and I am really happy with the outcome so please give it a go.

Controls:

menu; w and s to navigate up and down the options, then press enter to select the highlighted option. In the options page use a and d to navigate the options.

Ingame; w to thrust up, a and d to thrust left and right. collect the red fuel 'F' icons with the fuel tank (top left part of the lander) in order to collect extra fuel. Make sure you dont land too fast or you will crash.
